column2: The National Exam — or the Enem — is the most prestigious test for those living under a bureaucratic society. As a [Root.Government.GetName] ruler, it is your right and duty to have yourself certified by a Evaluator of Merit.
This bureaucrat has not been evaluated by an Evaluator of Merit, and is not seen as legitimate by vassals and peers.
This character has failed their National Exam, a grave blow to their legitimacy.
This bureaucrat has passed the National Exam, and has earned the first rank — Bacharelado.
This bureaucrat has passed the National Exam, and has earned the second rank — Mestrado.
This bureaucrat has passed the National Exam, and has earned the third and highest rank — Doutorado.
